import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { GlobalState } from '../../../../GlobalState' function AgendaItem({ agenda, isAdmin, deleteAposta, handleCheck }) { const state = useContext(GlobalState) return (
{ isAdmin && handleCheck(agenda._id)} /> }
{agenda.titulo}

{agenda.descricao}

{ isAdmin ? <>
+detalhes
deleteAposta(agenda._id, agenda.images.public_id)}> Deletar
Editar
: <>
+detalhes
}
) } export default AgendaItem
